rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
机器学习揭示代谢特征如何预测衰老和健康研究人员利用机器学习开发了代谢组衰老时钟，揭示了代谢物特征、健康结果和寿命之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Machine-learning-reveals-how-metabolite-profiles-predict-aging-and-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Machine-learning-reveals-how-metabolite-profiles-predict-aging-and-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f89772d-84de-4575-b469-1ca41103133b Wed, 01 Jan 2025 20:07:00 -0500 Machine learning reveals how metabolite profiles predict aging and health
创新技术让老年人更轻松地进行植物性饮食https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Plant-based-diets-made-easier-for-seniors-with-innovative-tech.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Plant-based-diets-made-easier-for-seniors-with-innovative-tech.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f485e7f-87c2-497e-ad14-14eb5e5e034d Wed, 01 Jan 2025 19:36:00 -0500 Plant-based diets made easier for seniors with innovative tech
加热手套有望缓解骨关节炎疼痛和僵硬一项研究评估了加热手套对手部骨关节炎的治疗效果，发现疼痛和僵硬显着减轻，但手部功能没有改善。需要进一步的长期研究来阐明它们的治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Heated-mittens-show-promise-in-easing-osteoarthritis-pain-and-stiffness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Heated-mittens-show-promise-in-easing-osteoarthritis-pain-and-stiffness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdbe6778-b340-4b0e-a16a-a96996522c98 Wed, 01 Jan 2025 18:58:00 -0500 Heated mittens show promise in easing osteoarthritis pain and stiffness
石胆酸可改善健康并延长寿命，模拟热量限制石胆酸 (LCA) 是一种由热量限制 (CR) 诱导的代谢物，可激活 AMPK 并具有抗衰老功效。最近的一项研究强调了 LCA 在改善衰老生物体的肌肉性能、葡萄糖耐量和寿命方面的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Lithocholic-acid-enhances-health-and-lifespan-mimicking-calorie-restriction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Lithocholic-acid-enhances-health-and-lifespan-mimicking-calorie-restriction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7207250d-21ac-4f8f-88d8-95d4b857b19a Wed, 01 Jan 2025 18:49:00 -0500 Lithocholic acid enhances health and lifespan, mimicking calorie restriction
出租车和救护车司机患阿尔茨海默病的风险较低研究表明，出租车和救护车司机的工作需要频繁的空间和导航处理，与其他职业相比，与阿尔茨海默病相关的死亡率较低。这些发现表明职业认知需求与 AD 风险之间存在潜在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Taxi-and-ambulance-drivers-show-lower-Alzheimere28099s-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250101/Taxi-and-ambulance-drivers-show-lower-Alzheimere28099s-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a2a2ae1-faaa-4a67-b552-8622b3313f09 Wed, 01 Jan 2025 18:24:00 -0500 Taxi and ambulance drivers show lower Alzheimer’s risk
免疫功能低下的成年人对 RSV 疫苗的反应较弱约翰霍普金斯大学医学研究人员表明，60 岁或以上的人免疫力较弱 -；主要是服用免疫抑制药物以降低排斥风险的器官移植受者以及其他患有免疫系统疾病的人 -；对呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 疫苗的反应不如免疫功能正常的同龄人那么强烈。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Immunocompromished-adults-show-weaker-response-to-RSV-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Immunocompromished-adults-show-weaker-response-to-RSV-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b69b25a5-0afa-4ed5-9b0e-fd202c6327d5 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:59:41 -0500 Immunocompromised adults show weaker response to RSV vaccines
探索改善肾癌患者治疗选择的新方法南卡罗来纳医科大学霍林斯癌症中心的研究人员正在探索改善肾癌患者治疗选择的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Exploring-new-ways-to-improve-treatment-options-for-kidney-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Exploring-new-ways-to-improve-treatment-options-for-kidney-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b68ab4a7-4164-4007-94cb-36209f4181b8 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:53:27 -0500 Exploring new ways to improve treatment options for kidney cancer patients
非药物疼痛干预为透析依赖性肾衰竭患者带来益处在患有透析依赖性肾衰竭的患者中，一种称为疼痛应对技能训练的心理治疗可以减少日常生活中的疼痛程度，也称为疼痛干扰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Nonpharmacologic-pain-intervention-provides-benefits-to-people-with-diaanalysis-dependent-kidney-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Nonpharmacologic-pain-intervention-provides-benefits-to-people-with-diaanalysis-dependent-kidney-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79fc28cb-8cb3-4b93-a3f7-248b7b675ea4 Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:49:33 -0500 Nonpharmacologic pain intervention provides benefits to people with dialysis-dependent kidney failure
智能手机应用程序可提高患者的保留率并减少阿片类药物的使用德克萨斯大学圣安东尼奥健康科学中心（UT Health San Antonio）的一项新研究表明，使用智能手机应用程序作为支持疗法并结合药物治疗时，阿片类药物使用障碍患者可以减少阿片类药物的使用天数并延长治疗时间显示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Smartphone-app-enhances-retention-and-reduces-opioid-use-in-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Smartphone-app-enhances-retention-and-reduces-opioid-use-in-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=690ac249-4da7-4482-b54d-29aed3e2582f Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:23:19 -0500 Smartphone app enhances retention and reduces opioid use in patients
研究揭示肾脏在高原适应中的作用皇家山大学生理学家和他的团队的一项研究证明了肾脏在适应高海拔方面的关键作用，并说明了夏尔巴人更好地适应高海拔攀登的另一种方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Study-reveals-role-of-kidneys-in-high-altitude-acclimatization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241230/Study-reveals-role-of-kidneys-in-high-altitude-acclimatization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4be200a-fd4e-45d2-ba02-6074acb9a3dc Mon, 30 Dec 2024 21:18:13 -0500 Study reveals role of kidneys in high altitude acclimatization
